topic.title: Glasgow Coma Score Organizer - conformance rules

section.p: Collection of Glasgow Coma Score observations

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11560 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2022-01-01"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11313)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11677)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation, where its type is Glasgow Eye (CONF:11682)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11678)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation, where its type is Glasgow Motor (CONF:11683)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component such that it (CONF:11679)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation, where its type is Glasgow Qualifier (CONF:11684)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] component such that it (CONF:11680)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation, where its type is Glasgow Total (CONF:11685)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:11681)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation, where its type is Glasgow Verbal (CONF:11686)
